name: Gluten-Free Bread
description: Easy gluten-free soda bread recipe made in 8 minutes. Freezes well.
preparation: Combine the first three ingredients in a medium bowl.
In another bowl, whisk the next five ingredients.
Combine wet mixture with dry mixture to form a loose batter.
Pour batter into a lightly oiled Rectangular Steamer. Sprinkle top with Spinach Dip Mix.
Microwave, without lid, for 5â€“8 minutes or until there are no remaining gooey spots.
Remove from steamer and let cool before slicing.

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.

products.name: Spinach Dip Mix
summary: Punchy blend with onion & sweet bell pepper.

products.name: Rectangular Steamer
summary: Easy to clean. Easy to serve. Rectangular, silicone steamer is perfect for side dishes & desserts.
